docs.title: Monarch API
docs.text:
monarch-api is a FastAPI for browsing the knowledge graph produced by the Monarch Initiative.

API Reference

Data Response Model

docs.title: For developers
docs.text:
You can install monarch-api from GitHub as follows:

# clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/monarch-initiative/monarch-app

# cd into the folder
cd monarch-app

# install
poetry install

docs.title: Monarch API Reference
docs.text: This section contains API reference for the various endpoints provided by monarch-api.

docs.title: Endpoints:
docs.text:
• Association
  • Entity
  • SemSim (Semantic Similarity)

docs.title: _get_associations async
docs.text: Retrieves all associations for a given entity, or between two entities.

docs.title: _association_table
docs.text:
Retrieves association table data for a given entity and association type

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default id str

ID of the entity to retrieve association table data, ex: MONDO:0019391

Query(Ellipsis, example='MONDO:0019391', title='ID of the entity to retrieve association table data for') category str

Category of association to retrieve association table data for, ex: biolink:DiseaseToPhenotypicFeatureAssociation

Query(Ellipsis, example='biolink:DiseaseToPhenotypicFeatureAssociation', title='Type of association to retrieve association table data for') query str

Query string to limit results to a subset. Defaults to None.

Query(None, example='thumb', title='Query string to limit results to a subset')

Returns:

Name Type Description AssociationResults AssociationTableResults

Association table data for the specified entity and association type

docs.title: _get_entity async
docs.text:
Retrieves the entity with the specified id

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default id str

ID for the entity to retrieve, ex: MONDO:0019391

Query(Ellipsis, description='ID for the entity to retrieve, ex: MONDO:0019391', example='MONDO:0019391')

Raises:

Type Description HTTPException

404 if the entity is not found

Returns:

Name Type Description Node Node

Entity details for the specified id

docs.text:
Data models for the Monarch Initiative data access library

URI: https://w3id.org/monarch/monarch-py

Name: monarch-py

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Association None DirectionalAssociation An association that gives it's direction relative to a specified entity AssociationCountList Container class for a list of association counts AssociationTypeMapping A data class to hold the necessary information to produce association type counts for given  entities with appropriate directional labels Entity Represents an Entity in the Monarch KG data model Node UI conatiner class extending Entity with additional information SearchResult None FacetField None FacetValue None AssociationCount None HistoBin None HistoPheno None NodeHierarchy None Results None AssociationResults None AssociationTableResults None EntityResults None SearchResults None
